entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High zero except minus 6 over northern sections.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero except minus 6 over northern sections. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
